page.title: 10PENDEWY FARM - BODMIN
page.content: The farm is Dad's farm and Dad, Grandad, Ray Banks (a hired man who does the milking) and Roger Sandoe (another hired man who does general farm work) are silage making at the{ } moment.{Silage }is grass that has been left to grow until is a good length. Then it is cut and treated with a chemical called{Silade.}It is left under plastic sheets until it is needed for winter feeding to the cows. We have about 200 cows. We used to milk them three times a day but our milk quota has been reduced so we now milk twice day. We breed the Pendewy herd of pure{Holstein}and {Friesan cows.}We keep the heifer calves for replacement stock and sell the bull calves at market.
